name: OCKWeekCalendarController
desc: A calendar controller that handles a calendar that shows a single week.

items.name: init(dateInterval: DateInterval, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a new week-long calendar controller, that contains a specific date.

items.name: init(weekOfDate: Date, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a new week-long calendar controller from a specific date.
